divs: sighting detailsi was riding my mountain bike about three miles from my home. i had just comeout of some woods into an open field about 500 yards long. the field wassurrounded by tall trees. above the trees in front of me at a height of about1,500 feet at a distance of less than 1\2 mile was a a stationary or hoveringvery bright-shiney-rounded-edged- pyramid, or teardrop shaped object. it did notmove for the 5 to 10 seconds i saw it and was very shiney reflecting a lot ofsun. the side facing me also seemed to be some what bulged out in my direction. i do not think i have ever even seen a drawning of some thing like this one. iwould guess it was the size of a small house. i continued pedaling and lookinguntil i came too close to the trees which blocked my view of the object. iturned around and pedaled back in the direction i had just come from to get itback in view, this took about 15 seconds, all the time looking back over myshoulder. i never did see it again, it just vanished. i then went as fast as icould back in my original direction knowing there was a large open area on theother side of the woods which i reached in maybe 1 1\2 minutes, but there wasnothing in sight. i also had a strong feeling i was being watched while i waslooking at the object. the object made no sound, but i did hear and see a propdriven plane five minutes later coming from the west.
